column4: somehow none of the menu icons show up(under the main menu) do you happen to know how to get them back?
i have no clue what your issue is
try changing your icon theme
weird, i cant even get into the themes selector... im trying to fix my dads linux box.. never ran into this myself before :)
try to restart the panels. it might help if i knew what you did last before menus went away
not sure he ever had them.. he says he did not since the install
metacity and metacity-common are both the latest versions
make sure ubuntu-desktop is installed
yup, latest version also
killall gnome-panel   what happens after that
restarts gnome-panel, when i go into prefs->themes i get the same error and no theme is installed still
is there a way to rebuild gconf from scratch
shouldnt have to just remove it (make sure its the right file) and restart
on edgy?
ok hold on let me check something first
go for it
go for what? i tried rm'ing ~/.gconf before
and it didnt do it?
no :(
do you have anything in ~/.gnomeprivate
nope
sorry its ~/.gnome2_private
you can try to remove ~/.gnome2
note you will lose any adjustments you made
